Text:
function EP03_26()
    --.結-1【9月第4週】「アナタの背中が早すぎて」
    SaveData.Title = "アナタの背中が早すぎて"

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM14.wav")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0689.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Akira, wake up, wake up! Today is the school festival!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ When I called out to Akira from outside the room, she came out looking really sluggish. ]])
    --//BU：アキラ（悲しみ・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,100,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0417.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "What is it? You're so noisy. I was playing games until three o'clock last night, so I'm sleepy." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0690.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Let's go to Yuriai Private Academy together. Since it's the school festival today, there will be a lot of outsiders, so if you come, you can totally blend in!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0691.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I've always wanted to go around the school with you." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0418.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Rejected." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0692.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eh!? Why!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0419.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "At the school festival, even more people gather at the school, where people usually gather a lot." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0420.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Are you telling me, who has a human allergy, to go to such a place? Someone like me who even gave up at the entrance ceremony?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0693.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I'll protect you." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0421.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Eh." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0694.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "At the time of the entrance ceremony, I was overwhelmed with myself, but now it's different." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0695.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Now I have confidence that I can protect you no matter what happens and definitely make you smile." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0696.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Hey. So, let's go together. I want to go around the school festival with you. I want you to see everyone at Yuriai Private Academy." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0422.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Mina, chi..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0423.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Ugh." ]])

    --//BU：なし
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,InCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

STOP_BGM(1000)

    --//SE：扉の閉まる音（バタンッ）
PLAY_SE("SEb006.wav")
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ Akira turned her back to me, went back to her room, and closed the door. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0697.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "A-Akira!? Why!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0424.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Mina-chin is great. She’s been working hard, and she's grown so much in these six months." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0425.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "But unlike Mina-chin, I haven’t grown. I’m still socially awkward, a shut-in, and still hate humans." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0426.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "...Please don’t worry about a useless person like me. Mina-chin is someone who shouldn’t be tied down by someone like me." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0698.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Why... do you say such sad things?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0699.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Akira, you’re not a useless person! You’re kind, mischievous, knowledgeable, sensitive, and your smile is super cute!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0700.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "You always support me... You’re my important family!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ No matter how many times I called out after that, there was no reply from Akira. ]])

    MSG([[ Before I knew it, it was already time to leave. ]])

    MSG([[ Although I felt torn pulling away, for the sake of my classmates who are waiting for me, I couldn't not leave. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0701.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "...Sorry, Akira. I’m going to school now." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0702.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I’m really sorry I couldn’t stay by your side all this time when you were in such pain." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0703.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I’ll come back as soon as possible." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0704.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "No matter how much you reject me. No matter if you hit me, kick me, or throw me away. I’ll come back again." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0705.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "...Because I love you, Akira." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Having said just that, I began to prepare to leave the house. ]])

    MSG([[ Holding my bag. _r Putting on my shoes. _r Grasping the doorknob. ]])

    MSG([[ I looked back several times, but until the moment I left the house, Akira’s door never opened―― ]])

    --//SE：扉の閉まる音（バタンッ）
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
PLAY_SE("SEb006.wav")
WAIT(500)
STOP_BGM(1000)

    --//BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    --//BU：アキラ（悲しみ・部屋着）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0427.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I, after all..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0428.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I love Mina-chin too." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0429.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "But I’m not a beautiful girl like Mariccho." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0430.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "My personality is twisted, and my only skill is gaming. I have nothing to be proud of." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0431.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "There’s no way someone like me could match Mina-chin." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0432.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "There’s no way I could..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --　　　◆

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP03_27")

end
